meta.note: Unique ID for the template. Cannot be changed after creation.
meta.validation_message: ID needs to be in snake case format weekly_report or welcome_email.

meta.note: Title for this template. Only used for organization.

This is a simple template engine based on template literals. See the Render Template flow. // Template is a string with placeholders in the format {{ key }} or {{ key.nestedKey }} // Loops are supported with the format {{ loop: key }} ... {{ /loop: key }}
Current status of the task. Options may change if approval is required to complete the task.

meta.note: What type of task is this?

conditions.name: If Created From Template, Then Read Only

meta.note: Template tasks that are draft or archived will not be included when creating new checklist runs.
Task start and due dates will be calculated relative to the option you select.
Relative days to use as the start date for this task - if you enter 7 and chose from "Start of Checklist", the task start date would be calculated and set to 7 days after the checklist start date.
What type of task is this? Used for grouping and filtering.
(Optional) If this task in the checklist template should always being assigned to a specific person - you can default that assignment here.
Which party is responsible for completing this task?
Embed YouTube, Vimeo, Wistia, or Loom videos
Links that are helpful or necessary to complete this task.
Does this require approval to mark as completed?
Relative days to use as the due date for this task - if you enter 3 and chose from "Checklist Due Date", the task due date would be set to 3 days before the checklist due date.
Default description that gets populated when running instances of this checklist.
Is this a one-off checklist or a recurring one?
Templates that are archived will not be able to be used when creating new checklists.
Always adds this user as the approver whenever the checklist is ran. Great if the same manager or person is always the approver on certain checklists.
Always assigns the checklist to this user whenever the checklist is ran. Great for recurring checklists that a specific person needs to complete.

What time will this recurring checklist run? (Note: Has to be in UTC(+0) time zone). So if your local timezone offset is +4 and you want to run at 7:00 am local time - you'd set 11:00 am. [This tool might be helpful](https://dateful.com/convert/utc)
Checklist will automatically run every week on this day.
Checklist will run once per month on the X day.
What is the current checklist status?
Who is responsible for completing this checklist?
User that receives and controls approvals for this checklist.
What template was this created from?
Attach preset files to include on the task.

conditions.name: Show If Template Type equals Recurring

meta.note: Helpful files or assets to complete this task.

conditions.name: If Current User and Approval Required

options.text: This task has been assigned to you, but it requires approval to mark as completed. Please set status to In Review once you're ready for review and the approver will be automatically notified.

conditions.name: If Not Current User and Approval Required

options.text: This task requires approval to mark as completed. Please review and confirm as completed.
